snippet: A criminal complaint said the website was created to replace the original Silk Road, used for drug sales and other illegal activities, which had been seized by the government.
abstract: Blake Benthall is arrested in San Francisco and charged with running black market website Silk Road 2.0, which was modeled after original Silk Road that was seized by government in 2013.
lead_paragraph: A criminal complaint said the website was created to replace the original Silk Road, used for drug sales and other illegal activities, which had been seized by the government.

headline.main: Man Charged With Operating Silk Road 2.0, a Black Market Website
headline.print_headline: Man Is Charged With Operating a Black Market Website
